attributes.title: Ridiculous
attributes.review:
Crashed the minute I tried to open it. Wouldn’t allow me to use the app without inputing my number. Once I did that I immediately started receiving text bad mouthing Democrats and begging for money.
Then it forced me to input my other personal data (name, address, email, etc.).
It has started filling my inbox with spam AND the app constantly crashes. ZERO STARS.

attributes.userName: I Swear Im Not A Racsist 😁✨
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY FRIEND 😭
attributes.review: Hello as a fellow African American woman👸🏾I wanted to come see what our “non” Cheeto looking homophobic, misogynistic, short bus riding president had for us in the up coming election, like how he would like this country to head in the white I MEAN right😂 direction, however I came to realize the app is CURSED😳 every time I closed my eyes I saw white people appropriating different cultures, and the red necks were having sexual relations with their cousins IT WAS AWFUL😭 but that’s not the worst part IT KILLED MY BABY IMAGINARY FRIEND NAMED ALL LIVES MATTER😭🥺🥺🥺🥺 *gets a tissue* 🤧 sooo needless to say THIS APP IS HORRIBLE ✨😘
